articles.title: Brazil vs Colombia Live score and updates | Copa America 2024 - Khel Now
articles.description: Brazil vs Colombia: Colombia holds Brazil to 1-1 draw. Raphinha's free-kick stunner meets Muñoz's equalizer.
articles.content: 05:00 AM: Hello everyone and welcome to Khel Nows LIVE COVERAGE of the Copa America Group D match between Brazil vs Colombia. The kick-off is just a few hours away! Please wait for 30 seconds for the… [+2315 chars]
